name: Beautiful Scenic Approach and Landing into Brussels (Brussels Airlines Airbus A319)
description:
Approach and landing into runway 07L at Brussels onboard Brussels Airlines flight SN2582 from Berlin Tegel (TXL), operated by Airbus A319 OO-SSA.  

We are treated toa stunning approach and landing onto runway 07L, where we get a great view of BRU from 9000ft on the downwind leg, followed by an approach over the centre of Brussels where many sights can be seen including the Atomium.

Full flight:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2w2hZnBwH1k

Airline: Brussels Airlines
Flight: SN2582 
From: Berlin - Tegel (TXL/EDDT) 
To: Brussels - National (BRU/EBBR)
Departure: 29 January 2014, 12:16
Arrival: 29 January 2014, 13:24
Distance: 394 miles, 634 km 
Flight Time: 1h08m
Aircraft: Airbus A319
Registration: OO-SSA
Class/Seat: Y/ 15A

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
